X

Hello!

I'm Michael, a full stack web developer from Manchester in the UK.

Passionate about building websites and apps with a variety of technologies, I enjoy both the visual design aspects of frontend development, and the challenges of the backend side of things.

My skillset includes Javascript, ReactJS, VueJS, NodeJS and database technologies including MySQL and Postgres.

Take a look at some of my projects below and don't hesitate to get in touch!

Projects

Green Oil

e-commerce website e-commerce website e-commerce website

Medical Illustration Database

Database built using ReactJS and Postgresql

This was build to replace an old MS Access database which had been in use since the mid 90s.

©  Michael Nix

After ten years as a clinical photographer in the National Health Service, I decided it was time for a change and shifted focus back to my first passion of computer programming.

My experience lies in the following technologies:

  • HTML and CSS
  • Javascript
  • ReactJS + Redux
  • VueJS + Vuex
  • NodeJS
